ygData.subject: Re: trading the stein comments
ygData.msgSnippet: ... No offense intended, but I believe THIS is the type of play style that leads people to extreme bordom with the game. A couple nights wasted in only ONE
ygData.messageBody:
> my buddy been camping the warden on
> sol ro for a couple nights for a belt
> of all the nights he camped him he's
> killed well over 15 wardens. try to
> get a claw or a belt (good luck).

No offense intended, but I believe THIS is the type of play style that
leads people to extreme bordom with the game. A couple nights wasted in
only ONE spot? Doesn't sound very entertaining.
